page.title: 12DORRINGTON VILLAGE
page.content: Dorrington is the largest village a small part of which lies in the survey area. The nucleus of the village lies along the A49 road from Shrewsbury to Ludlow. The village has a church and a small rural school with 39 pupils presently on roll.Within the village but just outside the survey area there are severel food shops including a butchers and also a garage which services cars as well as selling petrol.The village also has a retaurant called 'Country Friends'. zthere is also a quarry run by Evason H and Company.
